data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
With reference to our intimation dated November 08 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the audio recording of the earnings conference call with analysts and investors held today i.e. Friday November 14 2025 to discuss the Q2 H1 FY26 results is available on the website of the Company at www.tilind.com and can be accessed on the following link:

https://tilind.com/wp-content/uploads/investor/251114122653_TI%20-%20Q2%20FY26%20-%20Audio.mp3

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For Quarter Ended June 30, 2022
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today i.e. Thursday,              August 11, 2022, has inter-alia considered and approved the following:1. Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2022 along with the 'Limited Review Reports' thereon submitted by M/s. Harshil Shah & Company, Statutory Auditor of the Company and 2. Appointment of M/s. V. M. Kundaliya & Associates, Company Secretaries as the Secretarial Auditor with effect from August 11, 2022 for the financial year 2022-23;Details required under Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 read with SEBI Circular No. CIR/CFD/CMD/4/2015 dated September 09, 2015 is annexed as Annexure 1.The meeting of the Board commenced at 1.15 pm and concluded at 4.45 P.M.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For Quarter And Nine Months Ended On December 31, 2021
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today i.e. Wednesday, February 09, 2022, has inter-alia considered and approved the un-audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2021. Copies of the same along with the Limited Review Report submitted by M/s. Harshil Shah & Company, Statutory Auditors of the Company are enclosed herewith pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

The Board meeting commenced at 1.00 p.m. and concluded at 07.20 p.m. We request you to kindly take the above on your record.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Under
Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure
Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today i.e. Wednesday, February 09, 2022, has inter-alia considered and approved the following:

a. Un-audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2021. Copies of the same along with the Limited Review Report submitted by M/s. Harshil Shah & Company, Statutory Auditors of the Company are enclosed herewith pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015;

b. Appointment of M/s. NMAH & Co., Chartered Accountants as the Internal Auditors with effect from February 09, 2022;

The Board meeting commenced at 1.00 p.m. and concluded at 07.20 p.m. We request you to kindly take the above on your record.

The same is also available on our website www.tilind.com.

We request you to take the above information on record.

data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today i.e. Friday, November 12, 2021, has inter-alia considered and approved then unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021. Copies of the same along with the Limited Review Reports submitted by M/s. Harshil Shah & Company, Statutory Auditors of the Company are enclosed herewith pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

The same is available on our website www.tilind.com.
We request you to take the above information on record.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For June 30, 2021
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. August 14, 2021, has inter-alia considered and approved the following:

a. Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the first quarter ended June 30, 2021 along with the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors, which were approved and taken on record by the Board of Directors.
¬¬
b. The 86th Annual General Meeting (the AGM) of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, September 30, 2021 at 10.30 a.m. through Video Conferencing / Other Audio Visual Means OAVM.

c. Pursuant to Regulation 42 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), Regulations, 2015, the Register of Members and Share Transfer Books of the Company will remain closed from Thursday, September 23, 2021 to Thursday September 30, 2021 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of the AGM of the Company.

The Board meeting commenced at 12.25 p.m. and concluded at 2.30 p.m.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended March 31, 2021 Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of The SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the disclosure of Related Party Transactions, on a consolidated basis, for the period from October 01, 2020 to March 31, 2021 in the format specified in the relevant accounting standards.

data.caption: Financial Results For March 31, 2021
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith copy of Results.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith copy of outcome of the Board Meeting held today.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For December 31, 2020
data.news_body:
(i) The Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2020. Copies of the same along with the Limited Review Reports submitted by M/s. Harshil Shah & Company, Statutory Auditors of the Company are enclosed herewith pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015; and

(ii) the allotment of 151000 equity shares having face value of Rs. 10/- each to the option grantee pursuant to exercise of Employee Stock Option (ESOP)

After the present allotment, the post-issue paid-up equity share capital of the Company has become Rs. 1,25,43,46,030/- divided into 125434603 equity shares having face value of Rs 10/- each.

Please take note that the Meeting commenced at 1.30 p.m. and concluded at 2.50 p.m.
